name: Michael Klein
bio: Michael Klein’s third poetry collection is The Talking Day (Sibling Rivalry Press, 2013). His books of prose are The End of Being Known (2003) and Track Conditions (2003), both published by University of Wisconsin Press. Michael Klein’s fourth book of poems, When I Was a Twin will appear from Sibling Rivalry Press in September, 2015. He teaches in the MFA Program at Goddard College in Vermont and Hunter College in New York City.
